content.stimulus_en: The bank is (next to) ________ the pharmacy.
Take the second (turn) ________ on the right.
(go) ________ straight on for two blocks.
(turn) ________ left at the crossroads.
Is there a supermarket (near) ________ here?
How (get) ________ I to the museum?
Excuse me, can you tell me the way to the park?
Turn at right the corner and the library is opposite you.
The museum is next to the large shopping center.
Walk the across bridge and turn left at the fountain.
Go straight on until you reach the traffic lights.
The is cinema between the post office and the bank.
The modal or word for Mapa is '________'.
